name: The Imprecise Blind Man's Maze
description: A simple game on a blind man that is lost in a dungeon. You'll stumble upon walls, miss coins on the floor, step on traps and get hurt by different kinds of monsters. The map is 10x10 and there is an exit somewhere. Try getting a high score by ending the game with more hearts, coins and monster kills. Use WASD and press enter after each turn to move.
